svg.text:
Distribution under H₀ Distribution under H₁ (No Effect) (True Effect Exists)
│ │ │ ┌─┐ │ ┌─┐ │ ┌┴─┴┐ │ ┌┴─┴┐ │ ┌┴───┴┐ │ ┌┴───┴┐ │ ┌┴─────┴┐ │ ┌┴─────┴┐ │ ┌┴───────┴┐ │ ┌┴───────┴┐ │ ┌┴─────────┴┐ │ ┌┴─────────┴┐ │ ┌┴───────────┴┐ │ ┌┴───────────┴┐ │ ┌┴─────────────┴┐ │ ┌┴─────────────┴┐ └───┴───────────────┴──────────── └───┴───────────────┴──── μ₀ │ Critical μ₁ │ Value │ ▼
α (Type I Error) │ β (Type II Error) ████████████████████ │ ░░░░░░ │ │ ████████████████████████████████ │ Power (1-β)
The more the distributions overlap, the lower the power. Power increases with: - Larger effect size (distributions farther apart) - Larger sample size (narrower distributions) - Higher α (larger critical region)
